mapper.select: SELECT id, version, creation_date as creationDate, last_updated as lastUpdated, first_name as firstName, last_name as lastName, nickname, gender, date_of_birth as dateOfBirth, weight_in_kg as weightInKg FROM people WHERE id = #{id}
